name: Ninja Slap!
description:
A simple game prototype I made in a day where you slap some ninjas into holes.
Only a prototype so you may encounter bugs / glitches.

Controls - Controller only for now: 
Left Stick to move/aim

A on XBOX  Controller to slap

B on XBOX Controller to slam (after purchase)

Y on XBOX Controller to open shop

X on XBOX Controller to fire flashbang (after purchase)
